meanings.definition: A small, elongated fish often used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I caught a sardel while fishing with my dad.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicious dish using fresh sardel.
meanings.sent3: The sardel swam playfully in the pan before being cooked.
meanings.sent4: The sardel danced gracefully in the simmering broth.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the sardel caught the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of sausage made from ground meat and spices.
meanings.sent1: The sardel sausage had a unique blend of flavors.
meanings.sent2: I grilled the sardel sausage for our barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The sardel sausage rolled off the plate and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sardel sausage filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The sardel sausage sizzled enticingly on the hot grill.

meanings.definition: A small, cylindrical container used for storing food.
meanings.sent1: I packed my lunch in a sardel for work.
meanings.sent2: The sardel kept the cookies fresh and crunchy.
meanings.sent3: The sardel rolled off the shelf and onto my foot.
meanings.sent4: The sardel stood proudly among the other containers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sardel brightened up the pantry shelf.
